short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill your new tab with great wallpapers and turn it into a sticky note board!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NewTab Notes - Sticky Notes & Wallpapers transforms your browser's new tab into a hub of efficiency and personalization. With "NewTab Notes," your new tab is not just a gateway to the internet, but a space where your ideas, tasks, and creativity come to life.
"By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install "NewTab Notes" extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in terms of use"

Features:

★ Sticky Notes: Effortlessly add, drag, and resize sticky notes right on your new tab page. Jot down ideas, track tasks, and organize your day with this interactive feature.

★ Live Clock and Date: Always stay on time with a live clock and date displayed prominently on your new tab. Watch the seconds tick by with a smooth, live update that keeps you in sync with the day.

★ Glassmorphism Wallpapers: Choose from 12 amazing wallpapers featuring a modern Glassmorphism style. These blurred, transparent textures resembling glass add a layer of elegance and vibrancy to your new tab.

★ Customizable Experience: With "NewTab Notes," you have the power to personalize your new tab. Select your favorite from a variety of beautiful wallpapers and adjust your settings to suit your workflow.

★ Easy Access to Your Notes: Your sticky notes are always just one tab away. Whether you're keeping track of your daily to-do list or noting down sudden inspirations, your notes are always within reach.

Transform your new tab page into a personalized and efficient workspace with "NewTab Notes." Add a touch of sophistication to your browsing experience and make the most out of every new tab you open.
